general.METADATAMASTER:
select structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon,ordno
from 
( SELECT structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY updatedon desc ) AS ordno
FROM 
AxmMetaDataMaster
where updatedby =@username and (@structtype = '' OR structtype = @structtype) and structname <> 'axglo' 
ORDER BY updatedon desc ) a
union all 
SELECT structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY updatedon desc ) AS ordno
FROM 
AxmMetaDataMaster
where updatedby not in   ( select username from axusers where username =@username) and (@structtype = '' OR structtype = @structtype) AND structname <> 'axglo' 
ORDER BY updatedon desc
general.UPDATE_METADATAMASTER: update AxmMetaDataMaster set structName = @structName,structCaption = @structCaption,updatedon = CURRENT_DATE,updatedby = @updatedby where structType = @structType and structName = @structName
general.UPDATE_STATUS_METADATAMASTER: update AxmMetaDataMaster set structstatus = 'ready' where structType = @structType and structName = @structName
general.DELETE_METADATAMASTER: delete from AxmMetaDataMaster where structname = @structname and structtype = @structtype
general.CHECKDUPTSTRUCT: select case when exists (select 1 from AxmMetaDataMaster  where structName = :structname and structType = :structtype) then 1 else 0 end as c from dual
general.GET_TBL_ClMN_HINT:
SELECT table_name,column_name
FROM information_schema.columns
WHERE table_schema = @schema
ORDER BY table_name
general.GET_TST_CAPTION: select caption from tstructs where name = @structname
general.GET_TST_Fld_CAPTION:
SELECT 
CAST(
CASE 
WHEN COALESCE(caption, '') = '' THEN fname 
ELSE RTRIM(caption, '*') 
END AS VARCHAR(250)
) AS caption 
FROM axpflds 
WHERE tstruct = @structname 
AND fname = @fldname
general.GET_DC_CAPTION: select caption from axpdc where tstruct =  @structname and dname = @dcname
general.GET_DCISGRID: select asgrid from axpdc  tstruct =  @structname and dname = @dcname
general.GET_IVIEW_CAPTION: select caption from iviews where name = @structname
general.GET_PAGE_CAPTION: select caption from axpages where name = @structname
general.API_MO_INFO_BY_NAME: select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat                                         from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down'' and execapidefname = @apiname
general.GET_DCCAPTION_BY_TABLENAME: select caption from axpdc where tstruct = @structname and tablename = @tablename
general.GET_TST_FLD_CAPTION_N_SQLTEXT: select  CAST( CASE  WHEN COALESCE(caption, '') = '' THEN fname  ELSE RTRIM(caption, '*')  END AS VARCHAR(250) ) AS caption, fldsql AS sqltext from axpflds where axpflds.tstruct = @structname and fname = @fldname
general.GET_TST_FLD_CAPTION_N_TBLNAME: select distinct cast(case when COALESCE(axf.caption,'')='' then axf.fname else case when axf.allowempty='F' then left(axf.caption,length(axf.caption)-1) else axf.caption end end as varchar(250)) as caption,axd.tablename from axpflds axf join axpdc  axd on  axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct and axf.tablename = axd.tablename and axf.tstruct = @structname and axf.fname = @fieldname

dropdown.USERLIST: select username as name,username as caption  from axusers
dropdown.ROLESLIST: select groupname  name,groupname  caption from AXUSERGROUPS ORDER BY groupname
dropdown.TSTLIST: select cast( caption||'-('||name||')' as varchar(350)) as caption,name as name from tstructs order by caption
dropdown.TSTLIST_W_1STDC_TBLNAME: select cast( t.caption||'-('||t.name||')' as varchar(350)) as caption,t.name as name,a.tablename from tstructs t ,axpdc a where t.name = a.tstruct and a.dname='dc1' order by caption
dropdown.TSTLIST_BUT_CURRENT: select cast( caption || '-(' || name || ')' as varchar(350)) as caption,name as name from tstructs where name <> @structname order by caption
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM: select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then fname else case when allowempty='F' then left(caption,length(caption)-1) else caption end end ||'-('||fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct = @structname
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_WITHOUT_CAP: select fname as caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct = @structname
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_N_DC: select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then fname else caption end ||'-('||fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption, fname as name,dcname from axpflds  where tstruct = @structname and dcname = @dcname
dropdown.FLDLIST_W_DC_N_TBLNAME:
select distinct cast(case when COALESCE(axf.caption,'')='' then axf.fname
else axf.caption end ||'-('||axf.fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption,
axf.fname as name,axf.dcname,axd.tablename
from axpflds axf join axpdc  axd on  axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct
and axf.tablename = axd.tablename
and axf.tstruct = @structname
order by 3
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_W_TBLNAME: select distinct cast(case when COALESCE(axf.caption,'')='' then axf.fname else case when axf.allowempty='F' then left(axf.caption,length(axf.caption)-1) else axf.caption end end ||'-('||axf.fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption,axf.fname as name,axf.dcname,axd.tablename from axpflds axf join axpdc  axd on  axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct and axf.tablename = axd.tablename and axf.tstruct = @structname order by 3
dropdown.FILLGRID_SRCFLD:
SELECT cast(btrim(substring(substring(btrim(fname),'[^ ]*$'),'[^.]*$')) as varchar(30)) as fname from unnest(string_to_array( @fgcolumns , ','))
WITH ORDINALITY As T(fname, ArrayOrder)
union
select i.NAME a from vw_field_informations i
where i.TRANSID=@structname
and i.DCNAME = @sourcedc
dropdown.APILISTSQL:
select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat
                                                    from executeapidef where APICategory='SQL' and APIResponseType='Axpert'
dropdown.APILISTMO:
select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat
from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down'
dropdown.APILIST_BTN: select execapidefname from executeapidef where apicategory='Execute Script' order by 1
dropdown.FILLFROMAPISRC:
select cast(concat(caption,'-(',name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,name as fname from coretstructhdr a,executeapidef e
where a.apidefname =e.executeapidefid
and stransid= @stransid
and modeofentry = 'Select From API'
and e.apiresponsetype ='External'
order by 1
dropdown.CUSTOMDATATYPES:
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) as typename from customtypes 
union
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename
dropdown.HLINK_STRUCTLIST_BY_TYPE:
select cast(caption as varchar(100)) caption,name as name from 
(select caption||'('||name||')' caption, name
    from tstructs where 'tstruct' = @type
union all
select caption||'('||name||')' caption, name from
    iviews where 'iview' = @type
union all
select caption||'('||name||')' caption, name from
    axpages where 'page' = @type)a
order by 1
dropdown.HLINK_PARAMLIST_BY_STRUCTTYPE: SELECT  cast(pname AS varchar(100)) name, cast(pname AS varchar(100)) caption FROM ( SELECT  pname      ,'1' dcname      ,ordno FROM iviewparams WHERE 'iview' =    @type AND iname =  @sname  UNION ALL SELECT fname      ,c2.dcname      ,c2.ordno FROM axpflds c2 WHERE 'tstruct' =    @type AND tstruct =  @sname UNION SELECT  concat(tablename,'ID')      ,dname      ,0 FROM axpdc d WHERE    @type IN ('tstruct', 'page') AND tstruct =  @sname UNION SELECT  a.fname      ,a.dcname      ,a.ordno FROM axpflds a, axpages b WHERE a.tstruct = substr(pagetype, 2) AND b.pagetype != 'web' AND 'page' =    @type AND b.name =  @sname  UNION ALL SELECT  unnest(string_to_array( a.params,','))      ,null      ,0 FROM htmlsections a, axpages b WHERE a.pageno = substring(b.name, 3) AND b.pagetype = 'web' AND 'page' =    @type AND a.pageno =  @sname  UNION ALL SELECT  regexp_split_to_table(db_function_params,E',')      ,null      ,0 FROM (  SELECT  substring(unnest(string_to_array( forms ,',')),position('-(' IN unnest(string_to_array( forms ,',')))+ 2,abs((position('-(' IN unnest(string_to_array( forms ,',')))+ 2) - length(substring(unnest(string_to_array( forms ,',')),1,length(unnest(string_to_array( forms ,','))))))) stransid       ,db_function_params  FROM axpdef_axvars  WHERE    @type = 'tstruct'  UNION ALL  SELECT  substring(unnest(string_to_array( reports ,',')),position('-(' IN unnest(string_to_array( reports ,',')))+ 2,abs((position('-(' IN unnest(string_to_array( reports ,',')))+ 2) - length(substring(unnest(string_to_array( reports ,',')),1,length(unnest(string_to_array( reports ,','))))))) stransid       ,db_function_params  FROM axpdef_axvars  WHERE    @type = 'iview'  ) a WHERE stransid =  @sname ) s
dropdown.TSTLIST_MASK:
select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.transid,')') as varchar(500))
    frmcap,b.transid from axpflds a,tstructs b 
where a.tstruct = b.transid
and coalesce(a.mask,'No Mask')!='No Mask'
order by 1
dropdown.FLDLIST_MASKED:
select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500))
    caption,fname as name from
    axpflds
where tstruct= @structname and 
coalesce(mask,'No Mask')!='No Mask'
order by 1
dropdown.CUSTOMDATATYPE_LIST: select cast(typename as varchar(20)) name,cast(typename as varchar(20)) caption,datatype,width,dwidth from axp_customdatatype where isactive ='T' union all select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as name ,cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as caption ,datatype ,width,deci  as dwidth from customtypes where typename = @customdatatype and  @customdatatype is not NULL
dropdown.ENCRIPTED_FORM_LIST: select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,b.name as name from axpflds a,tstructs b where  a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.encrypted,'F')='T' order by 1
dropdown.ENCRIPTED_FIELD_LIST_BY_FORM: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500)) caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct= @structname and coalesce(encrypted,'F')='T' order by 1
dropdown.MASKED_FORM_LIST: select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,b.name as name from axpflds a,tstructs b where  a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by 1
dropdown.MASKED_FIELD_LIST_BY_FORM: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500)) caption,fname as name,masking,maskchar,maskroles,firstcharmask,lastcharmask from axpflds where tstruct= @structname and coalesce(masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by 1
dropdown.FIELDLIST_BY_FORM_UNION_TABLEIDS: select concat(case when allowempty='F' then replace(caption,'*','') else caption end,'-(',fname,')') caption, fname name  from axpflds where tstruct=@structname  union all  select distinct concat(tablename,'id-(',tablename,'id)'),tablename||'id' from axpdc  where tstruct=@structname  order by 1

general.METADATAMASTER: select structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon,ordno from  ( SELECT structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY updatedon desc ) AS ordno FROM  AxmMetaDataMaster where updatedby = :username and ( :structtype = '' OR structtype =  :structtype) and structname <> 'axglo' ORDER BY updatedon desc ) a union all  SELECT structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY updatedon desc ) AS ordno FROM  AxmMetaDataMaster where updatedby not in   ( select username from axusers where username = :username) and ( :structtype = '' OR structtype =  :structtype) and structname <> 'axglo' ORDER BY updatedon desc
general.UPDATE_METADATAMASTER: update AxmMetaDataMaster set structName = :structName,structCaption =  :structCaption,updatedon =sysdate,updatedby = :updatedby where structType =  :structType and structName =  :structName
general.UPDATE_STATUS_METADATAMASTER: update AxmMetaDataMaster set structstatus = 'ready' where structType =  :structType and structName =  :structName
general.DELETE_METADATAMASTER: delete from AxmMetaDataMaster where structname =  :structname and structtype =  :structtype
general.CHECKDUPTSTRUCT: select case when exists (select 1 from AxmMetaDataMaster  where structName = :structname and structType = :structtype) then 1 else 0 end as c from dual
general.GET_TBL_ClMN_HINT: select LOWER(table_name) AS table_name ,column_name from user_tab_columns order by table_name
general.GET_TST_CAPTION: select caption from tstructs where name = :structname
general.GET_TST_Fld_CAPTION: SELECT CAST(CASE WHEN COALESCE(caption, '') = '' THEN fname ELSE RTRIM(caption, '*') END AS VARCHAR(250)) AS caption FROM axpflds WHERE tstruct =  :structname AND fname =  :fldname
general.GET_DC_CAPTION: select caption from axpdc where tstruct =   :structname and dname =  :dcname
general.GET_DCISGRID: select asgrid from axpdc  tstruct =   :structname and dname =  :dcname
general.GET_IVIEW_CAPTION: select caption from iviews where name =  :structname
general.GET_PAGE_CAPTION: select caption from axpages where name =  :structname
general.API_MO_INFO_BY_NAME: select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat                                         from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down' and execapidefname = :apiname
general.GET_DCCAPTION_BY_TABLENAME: select caption from axpdc where tstruct = :structname and tablename = :tablename
general.GET_TST_FLD_CAPTION_N_SQLTEXT: select  CAST(CASE WHEN COALESCE(caption, '') = '' THEN fname ELSE RTRIM(caption, '*') END AS VARCHAR(250)) AS caption, fldsql AS sqltext from axpflds where axpflds.tstruct = :structname and fname = :fldname
general.GET_TST_FLD_CAPTION_N_TBLNAME: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CASE WHEN COALESCE(axf.caption, '') = '' THEN axf.fname WHEN axf.allowempty = 'F' THEN SUBSTR(axf.caption, 1, LENGTH(axf.caption) - 1) ELSE axf.caption END AS VARCHAR2(250)) AS caption, axd.tablename FROM axpflds axf JOIN axpdc axd ON axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct AND axf.tablename = axd.tablename WHERE axf.tstruct = :structname AND axf.fname= :fieldname

dropdown.USERLIST: select username as name,username as caption  from axusers
dropdown.ROLESLIST: select groupname  name,groupname  caption from AXUSERGROUPS ORDER BY groupname
dropdown.TSTLIST: select cast( caption||'-('||name||')' as varchar(350)) as caption,name as name from tstructs order by caption
dropdown.TSTLIST_W_1STDC_TBLNAME: select cast( t.caption||'-('||t.name||')' as varchar(350)) as caption,t.name as name,a.tablename from tstructs t ,axpdc a where t.name = a.tstruct and a.dname='dc1' order by caption
dropdown.TSTLIST_BUT_CURRENT: select cast( caption || '-(' || name || ')' as varchar(350)) as caption,name as name from tstructs where name <>  :structname order by caption
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM: SELECT cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then fname else case when allowempty='F' then substr(caption,1,length(caption)-1) else caption end end ||'-('||fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct = :structname
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_WITHOUT_CAP: select fname as caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct =  :structname
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_N_DC: select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then fname else caption end ||'-('||fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption, fname as name,dcname from axpflds where tstruct =  :structname and dcname =  :dcname
dropdown.FLDLIST_W_DC_N_TBLNAME: select distinct cast(case when COALESCE(axf.caption,'')='' then axf.fname else axf.caption end ||'-('||axf.fname||')' as varchar(250)) as caption, axf.fname as name,axf.dcname,axd.tablename from axpflds axf join axpdc axd on axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct and axf.tablename = axd.tablename and axf.tstruct =  :structname order by 3
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_W_TBLNAME: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CASE WHEN COALESCE(axf.caption, '') = '' THEN axf.fname WHEN axf.allowempty = 'F' THEN SUBSTR(axf.caption, 1, LENGTH(axf.caption) - 1) ELSE axf.caption END || '-(' || axf.fname || ')' AS VARCHAR2(250)) AS caption,axf.fname AS name,axf.dcname,axd.tablename FROM axpflds axf JOIN axpdc axd ON axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct AND axf.tablename = axd.tablename WHERE axf.tstruct = :structname ORDER BY 3
dropdown.FILLGRID_SRCFLD:
select fname from (select trim(regexp_substr(fgcolumns, '[^,]+', 1, level)) fname, level as arrayorder
     from dual connect by regexp_substr(fgcolumns, '[^,]+', 1, level) is not null) u
union all
select i.NAME a from vw_field_informations i            
where i.TRANSID= :structname            
and i.DCNAME =  :sourcedc
dropdown.APILISTSQL: select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat                                            from executeapidef where APICategory='SQL' and APIResponseType='Axpert'
dropdown.APILISTMO: select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat                                         from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down'
dropdown.APILIST_BTN: select execapidefname from executeapidef where apicategory='Execute Script' order by 1
dropdown.FILLFROMAPISRC:
select cast(caption ||'-('|| name ||')' as varchar(500)) caption,name as fname 
from coretstructhdr a,executeapidef e                                            
where a.apidefname =e.executeapidefid                                            
and stransid=  :stransid                                            
and modeofentry = 'Select From API'                                            
and e.apiresponsetype ='External'                                            
order by 1
union                                        
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename from dual
dropdown.CUSTOMDATATYPES:
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) as typename from customtypes 
union
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename
dropdown.HLINK_STRUCTLIST_BY_TYPE:
select cast(caption as varchar(100)) caption,name as name from 
(select caption||'('||name||')' caption, name
    from tstructs where 'tstruct' =  :type
union all
select caption||'('||name||')' caption, name from
    iviews where 'iview' =  :type
union all
select caption||'('||name||')' caption, name from
    axpages where 'page' =  :type)a
order by 1
dropdown.HLINK_PARAMLIST_BY_STRUCTTYPE: SELECT  cast(pname AS varchar(100)) name, cast(pname AS varchar(100)) caption FROM (  SELECT  pname,'1' dcname,ordno FROM iviewparams WHERE 'iview' =  :type AND iname =  :sname   UNION ALL  SELECT fname,c2.dcname,c2.ordno FROM axpflds c2 WHERE 'tstruct' =  :type AND tstruct =  :sname  UNION  SELECT  concat(tablename,'ID'),dname,0 FROM axpdc d WHERE  :type IN ('tstruct', 'page') AND tstruct =  :sname  UNION  SELECT  a.fname,a.dcname,a.ordno  FROM axpflds a, axpages b WHERE a.tstruct = substr(pagetype, 2) AND b.pagetype != 'web' AND 'page' =  :type AND b.name =  :sname   UNION ALL  SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.params, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS param_value,        NULL AS col2,        0 AS col3 FROM htmlsections a JOIN axpages b ON a.pageno = SUBSTR(b.name, 3) WHERE b.pagetype = 'web'   AND 'page' = :type   AND a.pageno = :sname   AND a.CAPTION ='test' CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.params, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL    AND PRIOR a.pageno = a.pageno    AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL  UNION ALL  SELECT  DISTINCT REGEXP_SUBSTR(db_function_params, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL),null,0 FROM  (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(forms_transid, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS stransid,db_function_params FROM axpdef_axvars WHERE  :type = 'tstruct' CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(forms_transid, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(reports_transid, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS stransid,db_function_params FROM axpdef_axvars WHERE  :type =  'iview'  CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(reports_transid, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a WHERE stransid = :sname CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(db_function_params, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL  ) s
dropdown.TSTLIST_MASK:
select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.transid,')') as varchar(500))
    frmcap,b.transid from axpflds a,tstructs b 
where a.tstruct = b.transid
and coalesce(a.mask,'No Mask')!='No Mask'
order by 1
dropdown.FLDLIST_MASKED:
select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500))
    caption,fname as name from
    axpflds
where tstruct=  :structname and 
coalesce(mask,'No Mask')!='No Mask'
order by 1
dropdown.CUSTOMDATATYPE_LIST: select cast(typename as varchar(20)) name,cast(typename as varchar(20)) caption,datatype,width,dwidth from axp_customdatatype where isactive ='T' union all select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as name ,cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as caption ,datatype ,width,deci  as dwidth from customtypes where typename = :customdatatype and  :customdatatype is not NULL
dropdown.ENCRIPTED_FORM_LIST: select distinct cast((b.caption||'-('||b.name||')') as varchar(500)) caption,b.name as name from axpflds a,tstructs b where  a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.encrypted,'F')='T' order by 1
dropdown.ENCRIPTED_FIELD_LIST_BY_FORM: select cast((caption||'-('||fname||')') as varchar(500)) caption ,fname  as name from axpflds where tstruct= :structname and coalesce(encrypted,'F') ='T' order by 1
dropdown.MASKED_FORM_LIST: select distinct cast((b.caption||'-('||b.name||')') as varchar(500)) caption,b.name as name from axpflds a,tstructs b where  a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask'  order by 1
dropdown.MASKED_FIELD_LIST_BY_FORM: select cast((caption||'-('||fname||')') as varchar(500)) caption ,fname  as name,masking,maskchar,maskroles,firstcharmask,lastcharmask from axpflds where tstruct= :structname and coalesce(masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by 1
dropdown.FIELDLIST_BY_FORM_UNION_TABLEIDS: select (case when allowempty='F' then replace(caption,'*','') else caption END||'-('||fname||')') caption,fname name from axpflds where tstruct=:structname union all select distinct (tablename||'id-('||tablename||'id)'),tablename||'id' from axpdc  where tstruct=:structname order by 1

general.METADATAMASTER: select structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon,ordno from  ( SELECT structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY updatedon desc ) AS ordno FROM  AxmMetaDataMaster where updatedby =@username and (@structtype = '' OR structtype = @structtype) and structname <> 'axglo' ) a union all  SELECT structtype,structname,structcaption,structstatus,createdon,updatedby,updatedon, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY updatedon desc ) AS ordno FROM  AxmMetaDataMaster where updatedby not in   ( select username from axusers where username =@username) and (@structtype = '' OR structtype = @structtype) AND structname <> 'axglo'  ORDER BY updatedon desc
general.UPDATE_METADATAMASTER: update AxmMetaDataMaster set structName = @structName structCaption = @structCaption,updatedon = getdate(),updatedby = @updatedby where structType = @structType and structName = @structName
general.UPDATE_STATUS_METADATAMASTER: update AxmMetaDataMaster set structstatus = 'ready' where structType = @structType and structName = @structName
general.DELETE_METADATAMASTER: delete from AxmMetaDataMaster where structname = @structname and structtype = @structtype
general.CHECKDUPTSTRUCT: select case when exists (select 1 from AxmMetaDataMaster  where structName = @structname and structType = @structtype) then 1 else 0 end as c from dual
general.GET_TBL_ClMN_HINT:
SELECT table_name,column_name
FROM information_schema.columns
WHERE table_schema = @schema
ORDER BY table_name
general.GET_TST_CAPTION: select caption from tstructs where name = @structname
general.GET_TST_Fld_CAPTION:
SELECT 
CAST(
CASE 
WHEN COALESCE(caption, '') = '' THEN fname 
ELSE RTRIM(caption, '*') 
END AS VARCHAR(250)
) AS caption 
FROM axpflds 
WHERE tstruct = @structname 
AND fname = @fldname
general.GET_DC_CAPTION: select caption from axpdc where tstruct =  @structname and dname = @dcname
general.GET_DCISGRID: select asgrid from axpdc  tstruct =  @structname and dname = @dcname
general.GET_IVIEW_CAPTION: select caption from iviews where name = @structname
general.GET_PAGE_CAPTION: select caption from axpages where name = @structname
general.API_MO_INFO_BY_NAME: select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat                                         from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down' and execapidefname = @apiname
general.GET_DCCAPTION_BY_TABLENAME: select caption from axpdc where tstruct = @structname and tablename = @tablename
general.GET_TST_FLD_CAPTION_N_SQLTEXT: select  CAST( CASE  WHEN COALESCE(caption, '') = '' THEN fname  ELSE RTRIM(caption, '*')  END AS VARCHAR(250) ) AS caption, fldsql AS sqltext from axpflds where axpflds.tstruct = @structname and fname = @fldname
general.GET_TST_FLD_CAPTION_N_TBLNAME: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CASE WHEN COALESCE(axf.caption, '') = '' THEN axf.fname WHEN axf.allowempty = 'F' THEN LEFT(axf.caption, LEN(axf.caption) - 1) ELSE axf.caption END AS VARCHAR(250)) AS caption, axd.tablename FROM axpflds axf JOIN axpdc axd ON axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct AND axf.tablename = axd.tablename WHERE axf.tstruct = :structname AND axf.fname = :fieldname

dropdown.USERLIST: select username as name,username as caption  from axusers
dropdown.ROLESLIST: select groupname  name,groupname  caption from AXUSERGROUPS ORDER BY groupname
dropdown.TSTLIST: select cast( caption+'-('+name+')' as varchar(350)) as caption,name as name from tstructs order by caption
dropdown.TSTLIST_W_1STDC_TBLNAME: select cast( t.caption+'-('+t.name+')' as varchar(350)) as caption,t.name as name,a.tablename from tstructs t ,axpdc a where t.name = a.tstruct and a.dname='dc1' order by caption
dropdown.TSTLIST_BUT_CURRENT: select cast( caption + '-(' + name + ')' as varchar(350)) as caption,name as name from tstructs where name <> @structname order by caption
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM: select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then fname else case when allowempty='F' then left(caption,len(caption)-1) else caption end end +'-('+fname+')' as varchar(250)) as caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct = @structname
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_WITHOUT_CAP: select fname as caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct = @structname
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_N_DC: select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then fname else caption end +'-('+fname+')' as varchar(250)) as caption, fname as name,dcname from axpflds where tstruct = @structname and dcname = @dcname
dropdown.FLDLIST_W_DC_N_TBLNAME: select distinct cast(case when COALESCE(axf.caption,'')='' then axf.fname else axf.caption end +'-('+axf.fname+')' as varchar(250)) as caption, axf.fname as name,axf.dcname,axd.tablename from axpflds axf join axpdc axd on axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct and axf.tablename = axd.tablename and axf.tstruct = @structname order by 3
dropdown.FLDLIST_BY_FORM_W_TBLNAME: SELECT DISTINCT CAST(CASE WHEN COALESCE(axf.caption, '') = '' THEN axf.fname WHEN axf.allowempty = 'F' THEN LEFT(axf.caption, LEN(axf.caption) - 1) ELSE axf.caption END + '-(' + axf.fname + ')' AS VARCHAR(250)) AS caption,axf.fname AS name,axf.dcname,axd.tablename FROM axpflds axf JOIN axpdc axd ON axf.tstruct = axd.tstruct AND axf.tablename = axd.tablename WHERE axf.tstruct= :structname ORDER BY 3
dropdown.FILLGRID_SRCFLD: SELECT CAST( LTRIM(RTRIM( PARSENAME(REPLACE(RIGHT(LTRIM(RTRIM(value)), CHARINDEX(' ', REVERSE(LTRIM(RTRIM(value))) + ' ') - 1), '.', '.'), 1) )) AS VARCHAR(30) ) AS fname FROM STRING_SPLIT( @fgcolumns, ',') UNION SELECT i.fname AS a FROM axpflds i WHERE i.tstruct = @structname AND i.DCNAME = @sourcedc
dropdown.APILISTSQL:
select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat
                                                    from executeapidef where APICategory='SQL' and APIResponseType='Axpert'
dropdown.APILISTMO:
select execapidefname as name,execapidefname as caption,execapiurl as url,execapirequeststring as reqstr,apiresponsetype as resptype,apiresponseformat as respformat
from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down'
dropdown.APILIST_BTN: select execapidefname from executeapidef where apicategory='Execute Script' order by execapidefname
dropdown.FILLFROMAPISRC:
select cast(concat(caption,'-(',name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,name as fname from coretstructhdr a,executeapidef e
where a.apidefname =e.executeapidefid
and stransid= @stransid
and modeofentry = 'Select From API'
and e.apiresponsetype ='External'
order by 1
dropdown.CUSTOMDATATYPES:
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) as typename from customtypes 
union
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename
dropdown.HLINK_STRUCTLIST_BY_TYPE: select cast(caption as varchar(100)) caption,name as name from (select caption+'('+name+')' caption, name from tstructs where 'tstruct' = @type union all select caption+'('+name+')' caption, name from iviews where 'iview' = @type union all select caption+'('+name+')' caption, name from axpages where 'page' = @type)a order by caption
dropdown.HLINK_PARAMLIST_BY_STRUCTTYPE: SELECT CAST(pname AS VARCHAR(100)) AS name, CAST(pname AS VARCHAR(100)) AS caption FROM (SELECT pname, '1' AS dcname, ordno FROM iviewparams WHERE @type = 'iview' AND iname = @sname UNION ALL SELECT fname, c2.dcname, c2.ordno FROM axpflds c2 WHERE @type = 'tstruct' AND tstruct = @sname UNION SELECT tablename + 'ID', dname, 0 FROM axpdc d WHERE @type IN ('tstruct', 'page') AND tstruct = @sname UNION SELECT a.fname, a.dcname, a.ordno FROM axpflds a JOIN axpages b ON a.tstruct = SUBSTRING(b.pagetype, 2, LEN(b.pagetype)) WHERE b.pagetype != 'web' AND @type = 'page' AND b.name = @sname UNION ALL SELECT value, NULL, 0 FROM htmlsections a JOIN axpages b ON a.pageno = SUBSTRING(b.name, 3, LEN(b.name)) CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(a.params, ',') WHERE b.pagetype = 'web' AND @type = 'page' AND a.pageno = @sname UNION ALL SELECT param.value, NULL, 0 FROM (SELECT SUBSTRING(value, CHARINDEX('-(', value) + 2, LEN(value)) AS stransid, db_function_params FROM axpdef_axvars CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(forms, ',') AS value WHERE @type = 'tstruct') AS derived CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(derived.db_function_params, ',') AS param WHERE derived.stransid = @sname UNION ALL SELECT param.value, NULL, 0 FROM (SELECT SUBSTRING(value, CHARINDEX('-(', value) + 2, LEN(value)) AS stransid, db_function_params FROM axpdef_axvars CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(reports, ',') AS value WHERE @type = 'iview') AS derived CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(derived.db_function_params, ',') AS param WHERE derived.stransid = @sname) AS s
dropdown.TSTLIST_MASK: select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.name,')') as nvarchar(500)) frmcap,b.name from axpflds a,tstructs b where a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.mask,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by frmcap
dropdown.FLDLIST_MASKED: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as nvarchar(500)) caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct= @structname and coalesce(mask,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by caption
dropdown.CUSTOMDATATYPE_LIST: select cast(typename as varchar(20)) name,cast(typename as varchar(20)) caption,datatype,width,dwidth from axp_customdatatype where isactive ='T' union all select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as name ,cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as caption ,datatype ,width,deci  as dwidth from customtypes where typename = @customdatatype and  @customdatatype is not NULL
dropdown.ENCRIPTED_FORM_LIST: select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,b.name as name from axpflds a,tstructs b where  a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.encrypted,'F')='T' order by caption
dropdown.ENCRIPTED_FIELD_LIST_BY_FORM: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500)) caption,fname as name from axpflds where tstruct= @structname and coalesce(encrypted,'F')='T' order by caption
dropdown.MASKED_FORM_LIST: select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,b.name as name from axpflds a,tstructs b where  a.tstruct = b.name and coalesce(a.masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by caption
dropdown.MASKED_FIELD_LIST_BY_FORM: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500)) caption,fname as name,masking,maskchar,maskroles,firstcharmask,lastcharmask from axpflds where tstruct= @structname and coalesce(masking,'No Mask')!='No Mask' order by 1
dropdown.FIELDLIST_BY_FORM_UNION_TABLEIDS: select concat(case when allowempty='F' then replace(caption,'*','') else caption end,'-(',fname,')') caption, fname name from axpflds where tstruct=@structname union all select distinct concat(tablename,'id-(',tablename,'id)'),tablename+'id' from axpdc where tstruct=@structname order by caption
